newProductId.description: New product ID to replace with

available_days.description: 0 -> Sun, 1 -> Mon, 2 -> Tues, 3 -> Wed, 4 -> Thu, 5 -> Fri, 6 -> Sat

gender.example: 0 -> Men 1 -> Women 2 -> prefer not to say
